short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Know what changes are done in JSON before it is late.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This tool is created to diff JSON content quickly. It help mainly to developers who are working with JSON configurations and content. This tool will highlight all changes, additions or removals.
